```{r setup}
library(rCAX)
```

The tables available in CAX along with their descriptions are:

```{r}
tab <- rcax_tables()
knitr::kable(tab[,c("name","description")])
```

The table ids for these are

The tables available in CAX along with their descriptions are:

```{r}
knitr::kable(tab[,c("name","id")])
```
